long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily download HD images and videos from Walmart's product detail pages with just one click.
Download high-resolution Walmart images and videos.

⭐Getting Started:

🚀 Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
🛍️ Open your target Walmart product page.
📸 Click on the Walmart Image  Downloader icon to open it.
📥 Download product images and videos.
📊 Export images and video details to Excel.

⭐Features:

🗂️ Download Images (ZIP format)
📑 Export Image Details (Excel format, XLSX)
🖱️ One-Click Download All Images (ZIP format)
📋 One-Click Export All Details (Excel format, XLSX)


❓Is it free?:
Yes, Walmart Image & Video Downloader is free to use.

❓Why Choose Walmart Image & Video Downloader?:

⚡ Fast and easy way to download Walmart product images and videos.
📝 Export product information including titles, SKUs, names, and URLs directly to Excel.
📈 Perfect for sellers, researchers, and anyone needing to save product details from Walmart.
